Texts.Eng: Did you just craft an inventor's table? I estimate your chances of survival have improved by 7.2%.
Erchius fuel for your FTL drive can be mined from moons. It should be noted that since Earth's destruction, all moons scanned have delivered strange, unpleasant and indecipherable readings.
Hope you like the new station, partner! We've even got a ^orange;Peacekeeper supply store^white; now!
I am able to reconfigure the ship's teleporter to teleport directly to the location marked by this flag. Place and interact with the flag to establish a name.
I am detecting a variety of life signs in this mine. If you are intending to search it for core fragments, I may advise adequately arming yourself first.
I see that you are eating sufficiently! With a full stomach, your body will slowly regenerate and heal.
I see that you've discovered some seeds. I suggest planting them in some tilled soil, and watering them until they grow. The tools you need can be built at a foraging table.
If you are not sufficiently confident in your personal combat capabilities, an alternative solution would be to dig closer to the planet's center to find the core fragments.
It seems you have discovered fire. My databanks tell me you're the 714 billionth person to do so. Well done! You can use the fire to cook food!
The new station ain't too bad, if I say so myself! We're risin' up, partner!
The weakness you are feeling is likely due to hunger. You should find something to eat in order to maintain your body's functionality.
This door will transport you to a challenging room that you may attempt to traverse. I applaud your intrepid disposition.
We've finally hit the big time, partner! The Peacekeepers are well an' truly back, and lookin' finer than ever!
Welcome to our mighty fine new place, partner! Why not check out our ^orange;Peacekeeper Furnishing store^white;?
You are starving! It is imperative that you obtain and consume some food immediately.
You discovered a collar. When worn by a tamed monster, these collars can provide a wide range of benefits. You can add them to a filled capture pod with a right-click.
You discovered a core fragment! These are useful objects. I estimate that you will require at least 20 of them.
You discovered coal! You can turn coal into torches to light your way. The chance of fatal incidents is dramatically increased in the dark. Explore the crafting menu.
You discovered dye. With these you can colour your attire to your liking. You can apply one to any piece of armour or clothing with a right-click.
You discovered some ore. Ore can be turned into bars using a furnace, bars are useful for crafting a wide range of equipment that may increase your life expectancy.
You discovered some plant fibre. This can be woven into useful fabrics at a spinning wheel.
You have found some wood. My databanks tell me wood is a material with a great many uses. I suggest you kill additional trees and explore your crafting menu.
You obtained a bow. Overcoming a monster with one of these significantly increases your chances of getting meat and rare crafting ingredients.
You obtained a capture pod. A monster can be captured in this if their health is low enough. Throw it at a monster to capture it. Captured monsters become tame.
You obtained an Enviro Protection Pack (EPP). These specialised devices enable the user to survive in otherwise inhospitable environments. You can also enhance EPPs with augments.
You obtained an augment. These modules can provide a wide range of benefits. Install them to an Enviro Protection Pack (EPP) with a right-click.
You've obtained a manipulator module. With enough of these you can upgrade your Matter Manipulator from the access panel on the right-hand toolbar.
